00019 #ifndef POLYNOMIAL_INTERVAL_FIT_HPP_cm131005_
00020 #define POLYNOMIAL_INTERVAL_FIT_HPP_cm131005_

00022 #include <algorithm> 
00023 #include <vector>
00024 
00025 // #include <boost/numeric/ublas/io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00027 // #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix_proxy.hpp>
00028 // #include <boost/numeric/ublas/storage.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector.hpp>
00030 // #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector_proxy.hpp>
00031 // #include <boost/numeric/ublas/operation.hpp>
00032 
00033 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include "InvertMatrix.hpp"
00036 
00037 class polynomial_interval_fit {
00038 public:
00039   typedef boost::numeric::ublas::slice slice;
00040   typedef boost::numeric::ublas::vector<double> vector_type;
00041   typedef boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<double> matrix_type;
00042   typedef std::vector<size_t> index_vector_type;
00043 
00044   polynomial_interval_fit(size_t poly_degree,
00045                           const std::vector<size_t>& index_vector)
00046     : poly_degree_(poly_degree)
00047     , indices_(index_vector)
00048     , chi2_(0)
00049     , dof_(0) {}
00050 
00051   size_t poly_degree() const { return poly_degree_; }
00052   index_vector_type index_vector() const { return indices_; }
00053 
00054   bool fit(const std::vector<double>& y) {
00055     return fit(y, std::vector<size_t>(y.size(), 1));
00056   }
00057   bool fit(const std::vector<double>& y,
00058            const std::vector<size_t>& b) {
00059     
00060     if (b != b_) {
00061       typedef std::not_equal_to<size_t> neq_functor;
00062       const size_t length_y(std::count_if(b.begin(), b.end(),
00063                                           std::binder1st<neq_functor>(neq_functor(), 0)));
00064       b_        = b;
00065       t_        = yf_ = y_ = vector_type(length_y, 0);
00066       make_slices_y(indices_, y, b);
00067       slices_x_ = make_slices_x(poly_degree_, slices_y_.size());
00068       x_        = vector_type((poly_degree_+1)*slices_y_.size(), 0);
00069       q_        = matrix_type(x_.size(), x_.size(), 0);
00070     }
00071 
00072     using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00073     // compute ata and aty
00074     const size_t poly_degree_plus_1(poly_degree_+1);
00075     const size_t nx(x_.size());
00076     vector_type aty(nx, 0);
00077     matrix_type ata(nx, nx, 0);
00078 
00079     size_t slice_counter(0);
00080     BOOST_FOREACH(const slice& sy, slices_y_) {
00081       matrix_type a(sy.size(), poly_degree_plus_1, 0);
00082       for (size_t j(0), n(sy.size()); j<n; ++j) {
00083         const double x(t_(sy(j)) - indices_[slice_counter]);
00084         for (size_t k(0); k<poly_degree_plus_1; ++k)
00085           a(j,k) = (k==0) ? 1 : x*a(j,k-1);
00086       }
00087       const slice& sx(slices_x_[slice_counter++]);
00088       vector_type _v(sx.size(), 0);
00089       matrix_type _m(sx.size(), sx.size(), 0);
00090       noalias(project(ata, sx, sx)) = axpy_prod(trans(a), a, _m, true);
00091       noalias(project(aty, sx))     = axpy_prod(project(y_, sy), a, _v, true);
00092     }
00093 
00094     // constraints
00095     const size_t nc(slices_y_.size()-1);
00096     // if degree>1 there are constraints on the 1st derivative
00097     const size_t nc_total(poly_degree_>1 ? 2*nc : nc);
00098     matrix_type ac(nc_total, nx, 0);
00099     for (size_t i(0); i<nc; ++i) {
00100       const double dx(indices_[i+1] - indices_[i]);
00101       for (size_t j(0); j<poly_degree_plus_1; ++j)
00102         ac(i,i*poly_degree_plus_1+j) = (j==0) ? 1 : dx*ac(i,i*poly_degree_plus_1+j-1);
00103       ac(i,(i+1)*poly_degree_plus_1) = -1;
00104     }
00105 
00106     if (poly_degree_>1) {
00107       for (size_t i(0); i<nc; ++i) {
00108         const double dx(indices_[i+1] - indices_[i]);
00109         for (size_t j(1); j<poly_degree_plus_1; ++j)
00110           ac(nc+i,i*poly_degree_plus_1+j) = (j==1) ? 1 : dx*j/(j-1)*ac(nc+i,i*poly_degree_plus_1+j-1);
00111         ac(nc+i,(i+1)*poly_degree_plus_1+1) = -1;
00112       }      
00113     }
00114 
00115     // fill atac=(ata + constrains)
00116     matrix_type atac(nx+nc_total, nx+nc_total, 0);
00117     const slice sx(0,  1, nx);
00118     const slice sc(nx, 1, nc_total);
00119     project(atac, sx, sx) = ata;
00120     project(atac, sx, sc) = trans(ac);
00121     project(atac, sc, sx) = ac;
00122 
00123     // solve and compute the parameters x
00124     matrix_type qc(atac);
00125     if (!ublas_util::InvertMatrix(atac, qc))
00126       return false;
00127 
00128     noalias(q_) = project(qc, sx, sx);
00129     noalias(x_) = prod(q_, aty);
00130 
00131     // compute the fitted values yf
00132     slice_counter= 0;
00133     BOOST_FOREACH(const slice& sy, slices_y_) {
00134       matrix_type a(sy.size(), poly_degree_plus_1, 0);
00135       for (size_t j(0), n(sy.size()); j<n; ++j) {
00136         const double x(t_(sy(j)) - indices_[slice_counter]);
00137         for (size_t k(0); k<poly_degree_plus_1; ++k)
00138           a(j,k) = (k==0) ? 1 : x*a(j,k-1);
00139       }
00140       vector_type _y(sy.size(), 0);
00141       noalias(project(yf_, sy)) = axpy_prod(a, project(x_, slices_x_[slice_counter++]), _y, true);
00142     }
00143 
00144     // compute chi2 and d.o.f.
00145     chi2_  = norm_2(yf_ - y_);
00146     chi2_ *= chi2_;
00147     dof_   = y_.size() - nx + nc_total;
00148 
00149     return true;
00150   }
00151 
00152   const vector_type& t()  const { return t_;  }
00153   const vector_type& y()  const { return y_;  }
00154   const vector_type& yf() const { return yf_; }
00155   const vector_type& x()  const { return x_;  }
00156   const matrix_type& q()  const { return q_;  }
00157 
00158   // returns fit (value, rms) for given t
00159   std::pair<double, double> eval(double t) const {
00160     using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00161     const size_t i(find_index(t));
00162     const vector_type a(make_a(t, i));
00163     const slice& sx(slices_x_[i]);
00164     return std::make_pair(inner_prod(a, project(x_, sx)),
00165                           inner_prod(a, prod(project(q_,sx,sx), a)));
00166                            
00167   }
00168 
00169   const double chi2() const { return chi2_; }
00170   const size_t dof() const { return dof_; }
00171 
00172 protected:
00173   vector_type make_a(double t, size_t i) const {
00174     const double dt(t-indices_[i]);
00175     const size_t n(slices_x_[i].size());
00176     vector_type a(n, 0);
00177     for (size_t j(0); j<n; ++j)
00178       a(j) = (j==0) ? 1 : dt*a(j-1);
00179     return a;
00180   }
00181   size_t find_index(double t) const {
00182     return ((t >= indices_.back())
00183             ? indices_.size()-2
00184             : ((t <= indices_.front())
00185                ? 0
00186                : std::distance(indices_.begin(), std::lower_bound(indices_.begin(), indices_.end(), t))-1));
00187   }
00188 
00189   void make_slices_y(const index_vector_type& iv,
00190                      const std::vector<double>& y,
00191                      const std::vector<size_t>& b) {
00192     assert(iv.size()>0);
00193     slices_y_ = std::vector<slice>(iv.size()-1);
00194     for (size_t i(1), ib(0), it(0), n(iv.size()); i<n; ++i) {
00195       size_t nb(0);
00196       for (size_t j(iv[i-1]), m(iv[i]); j<m; ++j) {
00197         if (b[j]) {
00198           ++nb;
00199           t_[it]   = j;//-iv[i-1];
00200           y_[it++] = y[j];
00201         }
00202       }
00203       slices_y_[i-1] = slice(ib, 1, nb);
00204       ib += nb;
00205     }
00206   }
00207   static std::vector<slice> make_slices_x(size_t poly_degree, size_t num_slices) {
00208     std::vector<slice> sv(num_slices);
00209     for (size_t i(0); i<num_slices; ++i)
00210       sv[i] = slice((poly_degree+1)*i, 1, poly_degree+1);
00211     return sv;
00212   }
00213 
00214 private:
00215   size_t poly_degree_;
00216   index_vector_type indices_;
00217   vector_type t_;
00218   vector_type y_;
00219   vector_type yf_;
00220   std::vector<size_t> b_;
00221   std::vector<slice> slices_y_;
00222   std::vector<slice> slices_x_;
00223   vector_type x_;
00224   matrix_type q_;
00225   double chi2_;
00226   size_t dof_;
00227 } ;
00228 
00229 #endif //POLYNOMIAL_INTERVAL_FIT_HPP_cm131005_
